articles.title: NATO marks 75th anniversary as foreign ministers meet in Brussels - NATO HQ
articles.description: Foreign Ministers gathered at NATO Headquarters on Thursday (4 April 2024) to mark 75 years since the signing of the Alliance’s founding document, the North Atlantic Treaty. Since 1949, the Alliance has ensured peace, democracy and prosperity for its members,…
articles.content: In a speech marking the anniversary, Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg welcomed that NATO is bigger, stronger, and more united than ever. He welcomed that the founding treaty, normally kept in Washi… [+1684 chars]

articles.title: Nothing teases new earbuds launching in April; two more phones coming this year - 9to5Google
articles.description: Nothing is set to launch two new smartphones in 2024, but a new set of earbuds before that at an April event.
articles.content:
Nothing is teasing the launch of its next set of earbuds while two more phones seem to be on the docket as well.
